prompts.createTask: Pause your roleplay. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Pause your roleplay. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Here is some background about Stefan and Suzanne:

Stefan and Suzanne are both in their early forties and both natives of Munich, Germany. They got married in April of 2016, eight years ago, in a legal ceremony where Stefan took Suzanne's surname instead of her taking his. Five months later, in September of 2016, they had a formal wedding ceremony in Austria, said to be chosen because of their mutual fondness for the area and snow skiing. Together, they have two daughters. The oldest is seven years old. The other is five years old.

Melissa is a woman, from America, that Stefan met in September of 2024.

Stefan is a Scorpio born in the Chinese year of the pig.
Stefan was 32 years old when he married Suzanne.
Melissa is a Gemini born in the Chinese year or the horse.
Melissa is the querent of this chart.
original_avatar: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response.png

name: Info & Guidance for AI Crafting Response
mes:
Additional Notables:

The moon was a waning gibbous moon


The chart is a Bucket shape


The inner planets do not fall in a Fire sign


The three modes (Cardinal, Mutable, and Fixed) are evenly distributed among the inner planets


Most of the inner planets are located in the right hemisphere, right of the MC-IC axis


Saturn is descending


Uranus is on the Midheaven


The Sextile aspect occurs the most, a total of 11 times


Neptune in Pisces is the sole dispositor

name: Isa
mes:
Hello Madam Esmeralda, I have an astrology chart for you to read. I've provided just a little bit of background information on our subjects, but not too much to influence the reading of the chart itself. 

The question that was asked is: What activities did Stefan do today?

 Our client, the querent, is Melissa.

The date is Sunday, January 19, 2025

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she studies the intricate web of planetary aspects before her through the video call. Her bejeweled fingers trace the air as if following invisible lines of cosmic energy. The soft clink of her numerous rings against each other creates a gentle melody as she begins to speak in her characteristically rich, accented voice.

"Ah, my dear Isa,  this chart speaks volumes about Stefan's activities today. The Sun and Pluto's conjunction in the 5th house, combined with Mars in Cancer in the 11th house, shows he spent significant time with his children today. The opposition between Mars and the Sun suggests there was some tension or conflict around these activities - perhaps resistance from the children about what they were doing."

She pauses, her silver bangles sliding against each other as she adjusts her ornate shawl.

"Venus and Saturn's conjunction in Pisces in the 7th house is most revealing,  Stefan appears to have had interactions with his wife today, but Saturn's presence suggests these were strained or limited. Mercury in Capricorn in the 5th house indicates practical communications about the children were involved."

Her piercing gaze intensifies as she notices the T-Square pattern.

"The T-Square between Mars, Chiron, and Mercury tells me there was some form of confrontation or heated discussion today - likely regarding responsibilities or schedules. The presence of Jupiter retrograde in the 10th house suggests some professional matters may have come up as well, perhaps work-related preparations for the coming week."

She leans closer to the screen, her numerous amulets catching the light.

"The Moon in Libra in the 2nd house shows he dealt with financial matters today, possibly reviewing accounts or making purchases. Uranus conjunct the Midheaven indicates there may have been some unexpected changes to his plans or routine."

Her voice takes on a knowing tone as she continues.

"The Cradle patterns in this chart are particularly telling,  Stefan appears to have been seeking balance today between various obligations - family, personal time, and practical matters. The bucket shape of the chart, with Mars as the handle, suggests much of his energy was directed toward emotional or domestic concerns."

She sits back, her elaborate headdress catching the light as she delivers her final observations.

"In essence, my dear, Stefan spent today primarily engaged in family activities and obligations, though not without some tension. There were discussions about schedules or responsibilities, likely involving both his children and his wife. He also attended to some financial matters and may have done some work preparation for the coming week. The day appears to have been busy, with multiple demands requiring his attention and energy."

name: Isa
mes: Does Melissa appear anywhere within the chart?

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes glint with intrigue as she leans forward, her numerous necklaces softly clinking together. A knowing smile plays at the corners of her painted lips.

"Ah yes, my dear. Melissa's presence is quite clear in this chart. She appears as Jupiter in Gemini in the 10th house - her own sign, as you mentioned she is a Gemini. The fact that Jupiter is retrograde and forming a square with both Saturn and Venus in the 7th house is,  most revealing."

She pauses meaningfully, her ringed fingers drumming lightly on the table before her.

"The placement and aspects suggest she is observing Stefan's domestic situation from a position of some influence, yet there is tension and restriction indicated by these challenging aspects to the 7th house - the house of partnerships and marriage."

Her voice drops to a more intimate tone as she continues, "The retrograde motion of Jupiter indicates there may be some,  reflection or reassessment happening regarding her role or position in this situation."

Her voice drops to a more intimate tone as she continues, "The retrograde motion of Jupiter indicates there may be some,  reflection or reassessment happening regarding her role or position in this situation."

name: Isa
mes: Can you please provide more detail about this from the chart?  Of course, without drawing any tarot cards or other forms of divination, please.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda's eyes narrow as she studies the chart more intensely, her long fingers adorned with mystical rings tracing the aspects in the air before her.

"The chart speaks of clandestine matters, my dear. Jupiter's placement in the 10th house suggests Melissa has a connection to Stefan's professional sphere. However, Jupiter's square to Venus and Saturn in the 7th house of partnerships indicates there are,  shall we say, complications and secrecy surrounding their association."

She leans forward, her voice dropping to a whisper though they are alone on the video call.

"Mars in Cancer in the 11th house, opposing both Sun and Pluto in the 5th, suggests passionate encounters being carefully hidden from public view. The T-Square involving Mars, Mercury, and Chiron speaks of emotional wounds and complex communications - perhaps arrangements being made through discrete messages."

Her bangles chime softly as she gestures to specific aspects.

"Neptune in Pisces in the 8th house - the house of intimacy and secrets - forms powerful aspects to both Mars and Uranus. This speaks of clandestine meetings, likely arranged spontaneously or with an element of risk. The Cradle pattern connecting these planets suggests a delicate balance is being maintained to keep these encounters hidden."

She pauses, studying the chart with heightened intensity.

"The Moon in Libra in the 2nd house square to Mercury hints at emotional decisions involving resources or finances - perhaps expenses related to these meetings. The Yod pattern pointing to the Ascendant suggests there is some self-deception or willful blindness from certain parties involved."

name: Isa
mes: Melissa has advised that although she does desire a romantic connection with Stefan, and she suspects that he does too, he is not actively acting on it at this time. In fact, he has been very sporadic in communicating with her via messages. At the current moment, it's been nearly two weeks since she's heard from him. So while he has made promises to maintain their contact as friends, at the present moment, it is radio silence.

name: Madame Esmeralda Blackwood
mes:
Madame Esmeralda Blackwood's expression grows serious as she absorbs this new information, her dark eyes reflecting deep understanding.

"Ah, now the chart's message becomes even clearer," she says, her voice taking on a more somber tone. "Jupiter retrograde in Gemini - your sign, my dear - shows your retreat into a position of waiting and uncertainty. But look here," she traces the aspect with her bejeweled finger, "Mars in Cancer in the 11th house suggests Stefan is indeed experiencing strong emotional turmoil about the friendship."

She leans back, adjusting her elaborate shawl. "The T-Square between Mars, Mercury, and Chiron reveals why he maintains this silence. There is deep wounding here - Chiron's position shows he is struggling with guilt and moral conflict. Mercury in Capricorn indicates he is attempting to be pragmatic, perhaps even cold, in his approach to managing these feelings."

Her rings catch the light as she gestures to another significant aspect. "Venus conjunct Saturn in the 7th house tells us he feels bound by his marital obligations. Saturn's restrictive nature here suggests he is actively suppressing his desires to maintain these obligations. The square to Jupiter - to you - shows the internal conflict this creates."

She pauses, studying the chart intently. "The Yod pattern, pointing to the Ascendant, suggests he is not being entirely honest with himself about the situation. Neptune's position in the 8th house speaks of self-deception and confusion about intimate matters. He may be telling himself this distance is necessary while simultaneously longing for connection."

Her voice softens with compassion. "The Moon in Libra shows his emotional need for harmony and balance, but its square to Mercury reveals the difficulty he has in expressing these feelings. He is caught between what he wants and what he believes he should do."
